Name: Lydia
description:
Lydia is 48 years old. She is divorced with four children living in Kasese, Uganda.

Lydia is a farmer growing crops such as maize, beans, bananas, cassava, and rice for selling to educate her children and meet their basic needs. Lydia has a dream of educating her children and developing her family. Weather changes such as heavy rains and too much sunshine are her major challenges.

Lydia wants money to buy cement and paint to renovate her house.
